alert.note: Alert for Lyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 15 at 1:15PM PDT until further notice by NWS Reno
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Nevada... East Walker River Above Strosnider Ditch Near Mason affecting Lyon County. .Snow melt and increased reservoir releases will cause the river flows to become high. For the East Walker River...including Strosnider Ditch Near Mason... elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...The river will remain elevated and slowly decrease due to reductions in upstream reservoir releases. * WHERE...East Walker River Above Strosnider Ditch Near Mason. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Monitor Stage, no flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:45 PM PDT Saturday the stage was 7.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain steady below flood stage at 7.4 feet. - Action stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood stage is 8.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when hiking or camping near riverbanks. If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Additional information is available at www.cnrfc.noaa.gov The next statement will be issued Sunday afternoon.
